name: Supermarket Sprint
description:
Supermarket Sprint is a game prototype developed by Nick Proctor and Andrew Tran. It features a player tasked with running around a supermarket in search of particular items, listed on the right side. Use WASD to move, hold E while nearby to collect the desired item, and use LShift to dash forward. Tasks can be skipped (with a cool down) by clicking the "skip task" button. The harder tasks give you more points per item. Try and get the highest score within the time limit!

Sprites provided by Poloviiinkin

https://poloviiinkin.itch.io/food
